login.short_password: Пароль не може бути таким коротким
login.email_unverified: Ви не можете увійти, доки не підтвердите свою електронну адресу
login.verify_sent: Будь ласка, дотримуйтесь інструкцій в електронному листі

docs.birth: Date of birth, place of birth
docs.company_inc_country: Company incorporation certificate copy in the same country in which the virtual number is needed
docs.address: Full address (street, building number, postal code, city and country)
docs.address_country: Full address in the same country in which the virtual number is needed
docs.address_city: Full address in the same country, in the same city in which the virtual number is needed
docs.pass_or_id_country: Passport or ID copy in the same country in which the virtual number is needed
docs.address_proof: Proof of address less than 6 months old (a copy of a utility bill)
docs.address_proof_city: Proof of address less than 6 months old, must be from the same city as the virtual number ordered
docs.address_proof_country: Proof of address less than 6 months old, must be from the same country as the virtual number ordered
docs.address_proof_country_3: Proof of address less than 3 months old, must be from the same country as the virtual number ordered
docs.address_proof_x2: 2 forms of proof of address (a copy of utility bill no older than of 6 months)
docs.photo: Photo verification (high definition colored photo of you holding your opened on the first page passport)
